column4: I have a script that rips a DVD to an avi file. I want to put a menu option in the right click menu (on mounted DVD icon) to run the script, like the "Copy Disk" option. Is there a reasonably simple way to do that?
yes, a very simple way in fact. Press Alt+F2 and enter 'alacarte' (no quotes)
once there, you will be able to create a menu icon through a very simple GUI interface.
did that help you at all?
